item.title: Kuwait is anticipated to experience slight growth in 2015
item.description: Source: KFH Research website. According to KFH Research, Kuwait’s economy is projected to experience stable growth in 2015. In their late December 2014 publication, “Kuwait Focus 2015: Positive Adjustments,” the firm predicts a 3.8% growth in real GDP for 2015, slightly lower than the estimated 4.1% for 2014. This prediction aligns with the anticipated moderate GDP growth of 4.5% in the overall Gulf Cooperative Council region from 2014 to 2015.
